name: Visual Studio Code
summary: Lightweight but powerful source code editor
description: Microsoft Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor with built-in support for debugging, version control, and extensions for enhanced development workflows.

commands.linux: curl -fsSL https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/packages.microsoft.gpg && echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/packages.microsoft.gpg] https://packages.microsoft.com/repos/code stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscode.list > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y code
